/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The buildings on the right side of the street are modern and sleek, their glass facades reflecting the sunlight. On the left side of the street, traditional Chinese architecture can be seen, adding a touch of cultural richness to the scene. The image is a beautiful blend of modern and traditional elements, showcasing the diverse architectural styles of Beijing.
